means: 克里克（姓氏； Francis Harry Compton, 1916-，英国生物物理学家，曾获1962年诺贝尔生理学-医学奖）

sentence.Network_en: As Francis Crick and James Watson say, the possibilities are endless.
sentence.Network_cn: 就像弗朗西斯?克里克和詹姆士?沃森说的:“无限可能性. ”

sentence.Network_en: On base of scientific experiments Crick presentedhis theory of visual consciousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 克里克在科学实验的基础上,提出了他的视觉意识理论.

sentence.Network_en: She might have shared the Nobel Prize with Watson, Crick and Wikins.
sentence.Network_cn: 她可以与沃森 、 克里克和威尔金斯共同享有诺贝尔奖.

美国大学翻译中文32 - DuSystem Forum... ... 引起并发症 superinduce 引起痉挛 crick 引起购买欲 presell.

list.abs: ... . . .NA中T换成了U因此非模板链又被称为编码链coding strand,有义链sense strand和克里克链(crick strand)而用来转录mRNA的DNA链被称为非编码链anticoding strand或无义链antisens.
i have never seen francis crick in ., 我从未见过神态谦虚的克里克.
Games are his forte ; he plays cricked and football excellently ., 体育运动是他的所长 , 他打板球和踢足球都很好.
I enjoyed the cricked match ; it was a good day ' s play ., 我很喜欢那次板球比赛 , 简直打了一整天.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: of unknown origin

entry.def: If you have a crick in your neck or in your back, you have a pain there caused by muscles becoming stiff.

means.word_mean: 1. a painful muscle spasm especially in the neck or back (`rick' and `wrick' are British)
1. twist the head into a strained position
